member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.CollisionManager.CollisionSensitive2D
member.summary: Component allowing GameObject to be noticed when it is in collision with another GameObject. In this case the component (dynamically added) provides the list of GameObject in collision with him.

member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.CollisionManager.CollisionSensitive3D
member.summary: Component allowing GameObject to be noticed when it is in collision with another GameObject. In this case the component (dynamically added) provides the list of GameObject in collision with him.

member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.CollisionManager.InCollision2D
member.summary: Component specifying that the GameObject is in collision with at least one other GameObject. This component is managed by , you do not have to add, update or remove it manually.

member.name: P:FYFY_plugins.CollisionManager.InCollision2D.Targets
member.summary: Gets all the GameObjects in contact with this GameObject.

member.name: P:FYFY_plugins.CollisionManager.InCollision2D.Collisions
member.summary: Gets all the collisions informations involving this GameObject.

member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.CollisionManager.InCollision3D
member.summary: Component specifying that the GameObject is in collision with at least one other GameObject. This component is managed by , you do not have to add, update or remove it manually.

member.name: P:FYFY_plugins.CollisionManager.InCollision3D.Targets
member.summary: Gets all the GameObjects in contact with this GameObject.

member.name: P:FYFY_plugins.CollisionManager.InCollision3D.Collisions
member.summary: Gets all the collisions informations involving this GameObject.
